mapper.insert: insert into song(mno, title, singer, recordDate, fileName) values(#{mno}, #{title}, #{singer}, now(), #{fileName});
mapper.select: select s.sno, m.mno, s.title, s.singer, m.nickname, (select count(*) from likesong ls where s.sno=ls.sno) as heart, m.profilePic, s.fileName from song s left outer join member m on s.mno=m.mno order by s.sno desc
select profilePic, fileName from song s right outer join member m on s.mno=m.mno where sno=#{sno}
